-- database: HSQL Database Engine 1.8.0

-- driver: HSQL Database Engine Driver 1.8.0
-- driver class: org.hsqldb.jdbcDriver
-- url: jdbc:hsqldb:mem:schemacrawler
-- jdbc compliant: false

CREATE TABLE AUTHORS
(
  ADDRESS1 VARCHAR,
  ADDRESS2 VARCHAR,
  CITY VARCHAR,
  COUNTRY VARCHAR,
  FIRSTNAME VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  ID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  LASTNAME VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  POSTALCODE VARCHAR,
  STATE VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE BOOKAUTHORS
(
  AUTHORID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  BOOKID INTEGER NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE BOOKS
(
  DESCRIPTION VARCHAR,
  ID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  PRICE FLOAT,
  PUBLICATIONDATE TIMESTAMP,
  PUBLISHERID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  TITLE VARCHAR NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE GLOBALCOUNT
(
  GLOBALCOUNT INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE PUBLISHERS
(
  ID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  PUBLISHER VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE CUSTOMER
(
  CITY VARCHAR,
  FIRSTNAME VARCHAR,
  ID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  LASTNAME VARCHAR,
  STREET VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE INVOICE
(
  CUSTOMERID INTEGER,
  ID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  TOTAL FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE ITEM
(
  COST FLOAT,
  INVOICEID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  ITEM INTEGER NOT NULL,
  PRODUCTID INTEGER,
  QUANTITY INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE PRODUCT
(
  ID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  NAME VARCHAR,
  PRICE FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE SUPPLIER
(
  SUPPLIER_ID INTEGER,
  SUPPLIER_NAME VARCHAR
);
